author: cnbc.com
title: P&F Industries Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
MELVILLE, N.Y., Feb. 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- P&F Industries, Inc. (NASDAQ: PFIN) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.05 per share of its Class A Common Stock, payable on March 2, 2018 to all stockholders of record as of the close of business on February 26, 2018.
About P&F Industries, Inc.
P&F Industries, Inc., through its wholly owned subsidiaries, is a leading manufacturer and importer of air-powered tools and accessories sold principally to the retail, industrial, automotive and aerospace markets. P&F's products are sold under its own trade names, as well as under the private labels of major manufacturers and retailers.

SOURCE P&F Industries, Inc.
